00020 {
00021         //set real world up vector
00022         Vertex up(0.0,1.0,0.0);
00023         
00024         //remember distance of cam for speed up
00025         float distance = m_GLCamera->getDistance();
00026         
00027         //calculate translation scale on 2D screen
00028         float distX = (float)(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/(float)(window_w)*distance;
00029         float distY = (float)(event.getMouseEvent().GetY() - m_mouse_y)/(float)(window_h)*distance;
00030         
00031         //move viewpoint by right vector and up vector with scale
00032         Vertex viewPoint = old_viewPoint + (old_rightVector*distX);
00033         viewPoint = viewPoint + (up*distY);
00034         
00035         //set new camera viewpoint
00036         m_GLCamera->setViewPoint(viewPoint);
00037 }

00047         Vertex front = old_viewDir;

00049         //remember distance of cam for speed up
00050         float distance = m_GLCamera->getDistance();
00051         
00052         //calculate translation scale on 2D screen
00053         float distX = (float)(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/(float)(window_w)*distance;
00054         float distZ = (float)(m_mouse_y - event.getMouseEvent().GetY())/(float)(window_h)*distance;
00055

00057         front.setY(0.0);
00058

00060         Vertex viewPoint = old_viewPoint + (old_rightVector*distX);
00061         viewPoint = viewPoint + (front*-distZ);
00062

Definition at line 72 of file GLCameraMediator3D.cpp.

00073 {
00074         //calculate rotation from 2D screen movement
00075         float xangle = (float)(event.getMouseEvent().GetY() - m_mouse_y)/(float)window_h*180.0f;
00076         float yangle = (float)(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/(float)window_w*360.0f;
00077         
00078         //rotate around the right-Vector
00079         Vertex viewDir = old_viewDir*cos(xangle*M_PI/180.0) + old_upVector*sin(xangle*M_PI/180.0);
00080         
00081         //stop moving, you'll loose your room
00082         if (viewDir.getY() > 0)
00083         {
00084                 viewDir.setY(0.0);
00085         }
00086         viewDir.normalize();
00087         
00088         //calculate new up vector and set y-axis to one
00089         Vertex upVector = old_rightVector * viewDir;
00090         upVector.setY(1.0);
00091         
00092         //rotate vectors by mouse move in x-axiy
00093         Vertex rightVector(old_rightVector);
00094         upVector.rotate(0, yangle, 0);
00095         viewDir.rotate(0, yangle, 0);
00096         rightVector.rotate(0, yangle, 0);
00097         
00098         //normalize vectors
00099         rightVector.normalize();
00100         upVector.normalize();
00101         viewDir.normalize();
00102         
00103         //set new camera position and rotation
00104         m_GLCamera->setRotatedX(old_rotatedX + xangle);
00105         m_GLCamera->setRotatedY(old_rotatedY + yangle);
00106         m_GLCamera->setRightVector(rightVector);
00107         m_GLCamera->setUpVector(upVector);
00108         m_GLCamera->setViewDir(viewDir);
00109 }

Definition at line 116 of file GLCameraMediator3D.cpp.

00117 {
00118         //calculate rotation from 2D screen movement
00119         float xangle = (float)(event.getMouseEvent().GetY() - m_mouse_y)/(float)window_h*180.0f;
00120         float zangle = (float)(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/(float)window_w*360.0f;
00121         
00122         //Rotate viewdir around the right vector:
00123         Vertex viewDir = old_viewDir*cos(xangle*M_PI/180.0) + old_upVector*sin(xangle*M_PI/180.0);
00124         
00125         //stop moving, you'll loose your room
00126         if (viewDir.getY() > 0)
00127         {
00128                 viewDir.setY(0.0);
00129         }
00130         viewDir.normalize();
00131         
00132         //now compute the new UpVector (by cross product)
00133         Vertex upVector = (viewDir * old_rightVector) *-1;
00134         
00135         //Rotate viewdir around the right vector:
00136         Vertex rightVector = old_rightVector*cos(zangle*M_PI/180.0) + upVector*sin(zangle*M_PI/180.0);
00137         rightVector.normalize();
00138         
00139         //now compute the new UpVector (by cross product)
00140         upVector = (viewDir * rightVector)*-1;
00141         upVector.normalize();
00142         
00143         //set new camera position and rotation
00144         m_GLCamera->setRotatedX(old_rotatedX + xangle);
00145         m_GLCamera->setRotatedZ(old_rotatedZ + zangle);
00146         m_GLCamera->setViewDir(viewDir);
00147         m_GLCamera->setUpVector(upVector);
00148         m_GLCamera->setRightVector(rightVector);
00149 }
